name: Air Eagle Aviation Academy
about: Air Eagle Aviation Academy, a project of Shaheen Foundation, PAF, is a world-class pilot training academy located at the old terminal of Allama Iqbal International Airport in Lahore. With ultra-modern facilities and a purpose-built campus, we ensure students meet their aviation goals. We use state-of-the-art training aircraft and devices, providing high-quality ground and flying training that meets or exceeds international standards. Our experienced instructors, including Chief Flying Instructor Gp Capt (Retd) M. Younus, offer comprehensive training for Private and Commercial Pilot Licenses. We also offer career counseling and mentorship through the DOD-approved SkillBridge program. Air Eagle Aviation Academy is dedicated to developing pilots with a professional attitude and operational capability, making it a premier choice for aspiring aviators.
